video.headline: Carli Judice stops bout with perfectly placed liver shot
video.caption: Carli Judice stops Nicolle Caliari with a knee to the liver to kick off UFC 318.
video.title: Carli Judice stops bout with perfectly placed liver shot
video.description: Carli Judice stops Nicolle Caliari with a knee to the liver to kick off UFC 318.

video.headline: Brunno Ferreira victorious in 1st round via armbar
video.caption: Brunno Ferreira makes quick work of Jackson McVey with an armbar submission in the first round.
